ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: I feel that I have little control over risks to my health.
Notes: 1= Strongly disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Agree; 4= Strongly agree; -555= Prefer not to answer

ElementDescription: If I am going to get cancer, there is not much I can do about it.
Notes: 1= Strongly disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Agree; 4= Strongly agree; -555= Prefer not to answer

ElementDescription: I think that my personal efforts will help control my risks of getting cancer.
Notes: 1= Strongly disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Agree; 4= Strongly agree; -555= Prefer not to answer

ElementDescription: People who make a good effort to control the risks of getting cancer are much less likely to get cancer.
Notes: 1= Strongly disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Agree; 4= Strongly agree; -555= Prefer not to answer

ElementDescription: Compared  to other people of my same ager, I am less likely than they are to get cancer.
Notes: 1= Strongly disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Agree; 4= Strongly agree; -555= Prefer not to answer

ElementDescription: Compared to others my same age, I am less likely than they are to get a serious disease.
Notes: 1= Strongly disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Agree; 4= Strongly agree; -555= Prefer not to answer

ElementDescription: When I get older, I will be more likely than others my same age to get cancer.
Notes: 1= Strongly disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Agree; 4= Strongly agree; -555= Prefer not to answer

ElementDescription: When I get older, I will be more likely than others my same age to get a serious disease.
Notes: 1= Strongly disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Agree; 4= Strongly agree; -555= Prefer not to answer

ElementDescription: When a person flushes from alcohol, this means: They are at-risk for developing alcoholism (alcohol dependence)
Notes: 0= No; 1= Yes; -777= Not sure; -555= Prefer not to answer

ElementDescription: When a person flushes from alcohol, this means: They are at-risk for developing cancer
Notes: 0= No; 1= Yes; -777= Not sure; -555= Prefer not to answer

ElementDescription: When a person flushes from alcohol, this means: They are at-risk for developing diabetes
Notes: 0= No; 1= Yes; -777= Not sure; -555= Prefer not to answer

ElementDescription: In your opinion, how likely do you think it is you will experience the following health problem in the future? Heart disease
Notes: 1= Completely unlikely; 2= Moderately unlikely; 3= Slightly unlikely; 4= Neither likely nor unlikely; 5= Slightly likely; 6= Moderately likely; 7= Completely likely; -555= Prefer not to answer

ElementDescription: In your opinion, how likely do you think it is you will experience the following health problem in the future? Diabetes
Notes: 1= Completely unlikely; 2= Moderately unlikely; 3= Slightly unlikely; 4= Neither likely nor unlikely; 5= Slightly likely; 6= Moderately likely; 7= Completely likely; -555= Prefer not to answer

ElementDescription: In your opinion, how likely do you think it is you will experience the following health problem in the future? Any type of cancer
Notes: 1= Completely unlikely; 2= Moderately unlikely; 3= Slightly unlikely; 4= Neither likely nor unlikely; 5= Slightly likely; 6= Moderately likely; 7= Completely likely; -555= Prefer not to answer

ElementDescription: In your opinion, how likely do you think it is you will experience the following health problem in the future? Alcoholism (alcohol dependence)
Notes: 1= Completely unlikely; 2= Moderately unlikely; 3= Slightly unlikely; 4= Neither likely nor unlikely; 5= Slightly likely; 6= Moderately likely; 7= Completely likely; -555= Prefer not to answer
